posts.title: First Day of 2026: Cubbon Park Reflections
posts.excerpt: A quiet morning walk in Bangalore's Cubbon Park with friends, reflecting on memories, roots, and the gentle beginning of a new year...

content.text: The morning was crisp and cool, a gentle breeze carrying the scent of dew-kissed grass and blooming flowers. As I stepped into Cubbon Park with my friends, the city's noise seemed to fade away, replaced by the chirping of birds and the rustle of leaves.
There's something magical about starting a new year in nature's embrace. The park, with its centuries-old trees and winding pathways, felt like a living museum of memories.

content.caption: Morning light filtering through the trees

content.text: We walked for hours, sharing stories from the past year, dreams for the future, and simply enjoying the present moment. The video below captures some of that serenity...
As the sun rose higher, painting the sky in hues of orange and pink, I realized how important these moments of connection are - with nature, with friends, and with oneself.
